resources.string:
Press the green plus button to add a new climb log. 

Use the Navigation buttons to: 
• See your profile, which contains information about you and recently logged activity. 
• See your friends. 
• See all of your logged climbs.

Database Developer: Javin Unger

UI Consultant: Alison Kane
This is your profile page. \nIt shows your username, bio, profile picture, and two of your most recent climbs.
This lists your routes.\nYour most recent route is at the top of the page. \nIf nothing shows up, go to the Log page and log a route.
Here you can view your friends.

You can use this page to log a recent climb. 
To accomplish this, 

1. In the "Route Name" section, enter a route name. This section is optional. 

2. From the "Type" drop-down menu, select the type of your climb. 

3. From the "Difficulty" drop-down menu, select the difficulty of the climb. 

4. From the "Color" drop-down menu, select the color of the route. 
5. In the "Notes" section, enter any additional comments or notes you have about the climb. This section is optional. 

6. Press the "Log It" button to submit the log.
